question: I want to know what the best duas I can seek from Allah (SWT) after prayer ....
answer:
QUESTION
I want to know what the best duas I can seek from Allah (SWT) after prayer to protect me from the grave's punishment, and most importantly to protect me from the was-was of the shaitan during my period of death so I die a Musliman instead of a kafir? I usually say "Alahoma Atho beka mena athabi Jahanam wa Athabi' kabir wa otha beka men fitnati donia wal akahria, wa fitnati'l massih al-dajjal." Is that good or do you have other doa I can ask Allah (SWT) on top of this? What about the doa for against the fitnah of the shaytan when I die?


ANSWER


Share:

One should recite the following Dua After every Salaah.

Allahumma Inni Audhu bika min Adhaabi Jahannam Wa min Adhaabil Qabr Wa min Fitnatil Mahya wa Mamat Wa min Fitnatil Maseeh-id Dajjal

Oh Allah! I seek your protection from the torture of Hell, and I seek your protection from the punishment of the grave and I seek refuge from the mischief of life and death, and from the mischief of the dajjal. (Sahih Bukhari 2:102)

And Allah Ta'ala knows best
Mufti Ebrahim Desai
